I think it would be nice. Though we'd first need some form of #6225 so pushNamed can specify it.

comments.body: this doesn't seem right... we're consuming the padding, but we're not actually updating the MediaQuery for the children.
oh, i see, this is the demo file, not a widget. probably ok then.

comments.body: Do you need to add it to line 178 too?

Nice catch. As the code was, the `SliverPadding` on line 134 applied the left/right safe areas, so the layout looked good, but we failed to respond to taps in the padding area. I've removed the horizontal padding there, and applied it at line 178 instead.
